Oh, boy. I tried time and time again to learn the ropes of this. I really did.
There's a good and bad side, but the negatives outweigh the postives.

Don't leave an ignorant comment telling me that I'm just a n00b or I suck or I'm a ♥♥♥. I didn't enjoy this game and am enitled to my opinion.

Pros:
The game can be fun if you are in friends and has a server that you know everyone.

Cons: 
1Community has rotted down to the point where it's CoD. No tolerance for newbies as everyone who still plays is a veteran
2Cheaters
3Nonsense 30x30 / 10x10 maps and game mods
4No competitive mode. That makes harder to find a server of people that are rly playing serious and wants to try all the maps and plan different tactics.
5Everyone plays the same map... People dont care more about the essence of the game.

该游戏可玩性高，除了基本的竞技还外有很多玩法，例如僵尸逃跑，僵尸感染，死亡逃跑，连跳等等诸多玩法，对于喜爱第一人称射击类游戏的人们来说，这也是一款不错的游戏，值得入手
Absolutely a GREAT GAME!!! There is nothing else to say.

[h1] A Counter Strike To The Gaming Industry [/h1]

[b]Sometimes I wonder why other games try and compete with CSS, I mean this is THE generic first person shooter, and the most enticing to play.[/b]

Remember when Battlefield 3 came along and it was conisdered the COD killer and all that, I feel like the COD killer title goes to games which try too hard to be about tactics and skill whereas Counter Strike out shines this issue with a certain element of simpleness, Generally in first person shooters you will find that no matter how much of the game you play if you don't kill enough people and get enough XP you are almost always going to be out skilled by a guy with a gun that is only available at prestige 20 or something like that and for the £40 I spent on Battlefield 3 this was certainly present 95% of the time and when you see this it really kills the fun.

[u]Fun[/u]

Now that's a word that games really revolve around, but if you try to make a multiplayer game overly serious it'll make all the mistakes COD makes every year, however Counter Strike evades these issue, How? Because there is no levelling up in CSS and it feels fun and not overly complicated like COD or BF3 and certainly not as bitchy as [i] my ex wife-[/i] their multiplayer systems are.

In the end it all comes down to gameplay, wether a game decides it's going to have the best FPS graphics in the world or the best sound effects if it doesn't get you geared up to the challenge of a real FPS game or focus on the key gameplay aspect of most games, being FUN. Then it doesn't deserve your money [i]Like my ex wi-[/i]

Overall this game could do with an update or two, I mean it was partially impacted by the previous one but a little touch up of it's mechanics would do wonders to this [b] COD KILLER [/b]

7/10 - But trust me any other FPS wont come close...

(Life advice... Don't take it (up the a.r.s.e))
-Pinkman
Was a good time with you CSS, more then 1500h on 3 Accounts, 10/10 would buy again
